    • 构造器详细资料

      • Property

        @Deprecated
public Property(java.lang.String url,
                   int deepth,
                   int topN,
                   OS os,
                   java.lang.String path,
                   boolean needsIndex)
        已过时。 
        crawl only one url
        参数:
        url - the url which want to be crawled
        deepth - deepth
        topN - max links of one page
        os - current operate system
        path - crawl files apth
        needsIndex - true - it will index the docs after crawl
        false - it will NOT index the docs after crawl

      • Property

        @Deprecated
public Property(java.lang.String[] urls,
                   int deepth,
                   int topN,
                   OS os,
                   java.lang.String path,
                   boolean needsIndex)
        已过时。 
        crawl many urls
        参数:
        urls - the array of urls which to be crawled
        deepth - deepth
        topN - max links of one page
        os - current operate system
        path - crawl files apth
        needsIndex - true - it will index the docs after crawl
        false - it will NOT index the docs after crawl

      • Property

        @Deprecated
public Property(int deepth,
                   int topN,
                   OS os,
                   java.lang.String path,
                   boolean needsIndex)
        已过时。 
        crawl many urls
        it will get urls from "path//url.txt"
        参数:
        deepth - deepth
        topN - max links of one page
        os - current operate system
        path - crawl files apth
        needsIndex - true - it will index the docs after crawl
        false - it will NOT index the docs after crawl

      • Property

        public Property(java.lang.String confXMLPath)
        read configure from xml file
        参数:
        confXMLPath -
